name: awed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
feeling great respect, sometimes mixed with fear or surprise: We stood there in awed silence. "How does she manage to run so fast at her age?" he asked in awed tones. See
awe
More examplesFewer examplesThe film inspires awed admiration.She described his powers in awed terms. An awed silence greeted the end of the performance.
